mapper.select: select case when sum(order_store_amount) is null then 0 else sum(order_store_amount) end sumstore from mfoyou_goods_order where store_id = #{storeid} and order_state not in (30,610,700,800) and to_days(order_pay_time) > to_days(now()) -3
